attributes.action: Offer a subsidised mortgage rate to all public service employees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With projected annual increases in pay for many public sector workers likely to be LOWER than inflation. The government could arrange for public sector employees, to receive some form of national discount on mortgage rates, (an agreed percentage less than the  Bank of England base rate). With the ever increasing cost of living many families whom serve the public, endurring lower wages than the private sector are finding their 'net' annual income lower each year.
